copy.signIn: Sign in with your credentials to pick up exactly where your team left off.
copy.signUp: Create your Lumiso account to unlock collaborative workflows and beautiful client experiences.
copy.recovery: Create a new password to get back into your account.

features.title: Streamline every client interaction
features.description: Centralize your communication, notes, and deal status in one intuitive workspace designed for modern agencies.

features.title: Forecast revenue with confidence
features.description: Track conversion insights, build predictable pipelines, and unlock powerful reporting without leaving Lumiso.

features.title: Automate onboarding with ease
features.description: Launch tailored workflows, automate reminders, and deliver delightful client experiences from day one.

leads.title: Lead Management
leads.description: Manage and track all your potential clients
leads.noLeadsAllStatuses: No leads found. Add your first lead to get started!
leads.noLeadsWithFilters: No leads match your current filters.

export.successDescription: Your filtered leads have been downloaded.
export.errorDescription: We couldn't generate the Excel file. Please try again.
export.noDataDescription: Adjust your filters or search to include at least one lead.

leads.noOptionsConfigured: No options configured for this field

totalLeads.title: Total clients
totalLeads.tooltip: Counts every client in your workspace. The badge shows how many new clients were added this week compared with the previous week.
totalLeads.trendAria: New clients changed by {{delta}} compared with last week ({{current}} vs {{previous}}).

conversionRate.title: Conversion rate
conversionRate.tooltip: Share of clients contacted in the last 30 days that moved to a booked or completed status. Compared to the prior 30-day period.
conversionRate.trendAria: Conversion rate changed by {{delta}} compared with the previous 30 days ({{current}} vs {{previous}}).

noActivity.title: No recent activity
noActivity.tooltip: Clients with no updates in the last 14 days, excluding those marked as completed or lost. Follow up to keep your pipeline healthy.
noActivity.trendAria: Inactive clients changed by {{delta}} compared with the previous week ({{current}} vs {{previous}}).

lost.title: Lost / closed
lost.tooltip: Clients moved into a final status such as completed or lost during the last 30 days. Useful for tracking closed outcomes.
lost.trendAria: Lost or closed clients changed by {{delta}} compared with the previous 30 days ({{current}} vs {{previous}}).

welcome.title: Welcome to Lead Management
welcome.description: This is your leads dashboard where you can track and manage all your potential clients. Here's what you can do:

trackLeads.title: Track Leads
trackLeads.description: View all your leads in one organized table with contact information and status.

filterSort.title: Filter & Sort
filterSort.description: Filter by lead status and sort by any column to find exactly what you need.

customizeColumns.title: Customize Columns
customizeColumns.description: Customize which columns to show and arrange them to match your workflow.

addFirstLead.title: Add Your First Lead
addFirstLead.description: Now let's add your first lead! Click the 'Add Lead' button (or + icon on mobile) in the top right corner to get started.
addFirstLead.disabledTooltip: Add at least 1 lead to continue

exploreDetails.title: Great! Now Let's Explore Lead Details
exploreDetails.description: Perfect! Now that you have a lead, let's see what you can do with it. Click on your lead in the table below to view its detailed information.
exploreDetails.disabledTooltip: Click on your lead to continue

scheduling.title: Schedule Your First Photo Session
scheduling.description: Let's walk through scheduling a photo session for your client. This process will help you organize your photography workflow.

chooseDateTime.title: Choose Date & Time
chooseDateTime.description: Pick a convenient time that works for both you and your client.

selectClient.title: Select Your Client
selectClient.description: Choose the lead/client you want to photograph from your list.

addDetails.title: Add Session Details
addDetails.description: Include notes, special requirements, and optional project association.

selectLeadForSession.title: Select a Lead to Schedule Session
selectLeadForSession.description: Great! Now click on one of your leads in the table below to open their details page where you can schedule a session.
selectLeadForSession.disabledTooltip: Click on a lead to continue

messages.tutorialCompleted: Lead tutorial completed! Step 2 completed, navigating back to getting-started
messages.failedToSaveProgress: Failed to save progress. Please try again.
messages.columnPreferencesError: Failed to save column preferences. Please try again.

tooltips.projectRequired: Create a project first to continue
tooltips.viewProject: Click on your project to continue

messages.projectsShortcut: You can access all your projects anytime from the Projects page in the sidebar!
messages.sessionAdded: Your session has been added to your calendar and you can find it in the Calendar page!

intro.title: Welcome to Lead Details! üìã
intro.description: This is where you manage all information about a specific lead. Let's explore what you can see and do here:

sections.title: Client Information
sections.description: View and edit contact details, notes, and lead status on the left side.

sections.title: Projects Section
sections.description: Convert leads into projects with timelines, deliverables, and workflow tracking.

sections.title: Activity Timeline
sections.description: Track interactions, changes, and progress across every touchpoint.

createProject.title: Create Your First Project
createProject.description: Great! Turn this lead into a project by clicking the ‚ÄúAdd Project‚Äù button below.
createProject.disabledTooltip: Create a project first to continue

exploreProjects.title: Perfect! Now Explore Your Project Features
exploreProjects.description: Open the project card below to explore powerful project management tools:
exploreProjects.disabledTooltip: Click on your project to continue

complete.title: üéâ Congratulations! Tutorial Complete!
complete.description: Amazing work! You've mastered the fundamentals‚Äîfrom creating leads and converting them to projects, to managing client details and tracking progress.
complete.projectsShortcut: You can access all your projects anytime from the Projects page in the sidebar!

scheduleSession.title: Schedule Your Photo Session
scheduleSession.description: Let‚Äôs schedule a photo session for this client. Click ‚ÄúSchedule Session‚Äù below to open the form.

sections.title: Session Scheduling
sections.description: Choose a date and time that works for both you and your client.

sections.title: Calendar Integration
sections.description: Sessions automatically sync with your calendar for effortless planning.

sessionScheduled.title: üéâ Session Scheduled Successfully!
sessionScheduled.description: Excellent! Your session is on the calendar and visible in your session timeline here.
sessionScheduled.banner: Your session has been added to your calendar and you can find it in the Calendar page!
tips: Sessions appear in your lead's activity timeline
Update session status as you progress
Associate sessions with projects for better organization

localization.title: Localization
localization.subtitle: Manage languages and translations for your application

alert.title: Translation Workflow:
alert.description: Download existing files, translate them in your preferred tool, and upload the updated files back.
alert.proTipsDescription: Use translation tools like Crowdin, Weblate, or even Google Translate for bulk translations. Always test your translations in the app after uploading to ensure proper formatting.

steps.title: Download
steps.description: Download the translation file(s) you want to work with. Choose individual files or complete language packs.

steps.title: Translate
steps.description: Edit the JSON files using any text editor or translation tool. Maintain the structure and only change the values.

steps.title: Upload
steps.description: Upload the modified files back to the system. The changes will be validated and applied.

threshold.description: Minimum percentage of translations required to show a language

reviewTemplates.title: Review Your Package Templates
reviewTemplates.description: We've created some default photography packages for you. You can modify, delete, or keep them as they are. Click on any package to edit its details.
reviewTemplates.tip: Tip: You can edit package names, descriptions, and what's included

setPricing.title: Set Your Package Pricing
setPricing.description: Add or update pricing for your packages to streamline your client proposals and booking process.
setPricing.tip: Remember: You can always adjust prices later for individual projects

configureServices.description: Review and customize the individual services that make up your packages. These are the building blocks you'll use when creating packages.
configureServices.tip: Services can be reused across multiple packages

silentHours.disabledDesc: When disabled, messages will be sent immediately regardless of the time of day
